lines.text: You are wise, High Wolf. Them singin' wires would call the soldiers and that would mean the finish for your braves.
Good. Gus Lynch good friend to Red Man.
I tell you only what is good for High Wolf and his people.

[Referring to Alice]
I told ya she's in cahoots with Lynch.
I don't know what their game is, but I'm not letting any woman pull the wool over my eyes!
